channel.title: Items
channel.description: how do i add items into the game im getting this error when adding items into shops , also i already loaded the prices.[quote][Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "15037 1" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:147) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . ./quote]

item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

im using the lost legacy source, i am trying to add some chaotic items into a previously placed shop, i got the ids and i sucessfully spawned the items, so i know the ids are correct. i changed the prices in the text document in the cfg’s and get this error when trying to restart the server with the updated shop
